Class OpportunityRepository

java.lang.Object
repositories.OpportunityRepository
public class OpportunityRepository extends Object
Repository class that stores and manages all InternshipOpportunity records within the system.

This repository provides methods to:

  • Retrieve all internship opportunities
  • Retrieve opportunities owned by a specific company representative
  • Retrieve pending opportunities awaiting approval
  • Add new internship opportunities
  • Filter opportunities based on a Filter

The repository internally uses an ArrayList as its storage structure.

    • getRelevantInternshipOpportunities

      public ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> getRelevantInternshipOpportunities(String name)
      Retrieves internship opportunities created by or assigned to a specific company representative.
      Parameters:
      name - the user ID or name of the company representative in charge
      Returns:
      the list of relevant internship opportunities

    • getPendingInternshipOpportunities

      public ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> getPendingInternshipOpportunities()
      Retrieves all internship opportunities that are still pending approval.
      Returns:
      a list of opportunities with status InternshipOpportunity.Status.PENDING

    • addInternshipOpportunity

      public void addInternshipOpportunity(InternshipOpportunity internshipOpportunity)
      Adds a new internship opportunity to the repository.
      Parameters:
      internshipOpportunity - the opportunity to be added

    • filterOpportunities

      public ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> filterOpportunities(Filter filter)
      Filters internship opportunities based on the criteria provided in the specified Filter.

      The filtering criteria may include:

      • Status
      • Preferred student major
      • Internship level
      • Earliest application opening date
      • Latest application closing date

      Any null filter values are ignored.

      Parameters:
      filter - the filtering criteria to apply
      Returns:
      a filtered list of internship opportunities
